text: Ezɨ kɨ kamaghɨn men akam ikaragha ghaze, “Godɨn Uan Nguibamɨn Itim, e an ingangarir gumaziba, an en akuraghtɨ e ingangarir kam damigham. Ezɨ iarara, Jerusalem ian nguibar ekiam puvatɨ. Fomɨra ian inazir afeziaba nguibar ekiar kamɨn ikezir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ingangarir kam ian bizim puvatɨ.”
